label: specifiedMarking
comment: A marking specified for this logistics packaging.
A marking specified for this supply chain packaging, such as an inscription, stamp or label to indicate date, ownership, quality, manufacture or origin.

rangeIncludes.comment: An inscription, stamp or label on packaging, such as to indicate date, ownership, quality, manufacture or origin.

domainIncludes.comment: Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, whether or not any goods are contained within.
Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
